Wisdom: أَعْلَمُ [أَعْظَمُ‏] النَّاسِ مَنْ لَمْ يُزِلِ الشَّكُ يَقِينَهُ
enWisdom: The most learned of people is one whose doubt does not dispel his certainty

Wisdom: إِذَا أَرْذَلَ اللَّهُ عَبْداً حَظَرَ عَلَيْهِ الْعِلْمَ
enWisdom: When Allah humiliates (or abases) a servant, He denies him knowledge

Wisdom: مَنِ ادَّعَى مِنَ الْعِلْمِ غَايَتَهُ فَقَدْ أَظْهَرَ مِنْ جَهْلِهِ نِهَايَتَهُ
enWisdom: One who claims to have reached the end of knowledge has manifested the highest level of ignorance

Wisdom: عِلْمٌ لَا يُصْلِحُكَ ضَلَالٌ وَمَالٌ لَا يَنْفَعُكَ وَبَالٌ
enWisdom: Knowledge that does not reform you is misguidance and wealth that does not benefit you is a curse

Wisdom: لَا تُعَادُوا مَا تَجْهَلُونَ فَإِنَّ أَكْثَرَ الْعِلْمِ فِيمَا لَا تَعْرِفُونَ
enWisdom: Do not make enmity with that which you are ignorant of, for indeed most of knowledge is in that which you don’t know
The one who presents a strong argument may get support

Wisdom: لِيَكُنْ مَسْأَلَتُكَ مَا يَبْقَى لَكَ جَمَالُهُ وَيُنْفَى عَنْكَ وَبَالُهُ
enWisdom: Let your request be for a thing, the charm of which will last for you long after the negative consequences [of your asking] have ended
Every cognizant one is averse [to the temporary pleasures of this world]
No one antagonizes the learned like the ignorant [do]

Wisdom: لَا يُؤْتَى الْعِلْمُ إِلَّا مِنْ سُوءِ فَهْمِ السَّامِعِ
enWisdom: Knowledge is not ruined except by the miscomprehension of the listener
A scholar does not seek justice from an ignorant person

Wisdom: اسْتَدِلَّ عَلَى مَا لَمْ يَكُنْ بِمَا كَانَ فَإِنَّ الْأُمُورَ أَشْبَاهٌ
enWisdom: Deduce that which has not happened from that which has transpired, for matters are similar

Wisdom: يُسْتَدَلُّ عَلَى مَا لَمْ يَكُنْ بِمَا قَدْ كَانَ
enWisdom: What has not [yet] happened can be deduced from what has transpired
